tool_description: Retrieves current motor control parameters including voltage, frequency, and torque settings from specified motors.

motor_id.description: Unique identifier of the motor to read parameters from

error_messages: Motor not found: The specified motor_id does not exist in the system. Verify the motor ID and connection status.
Invalid parameter type: One or more parameter types are not supported. Use: voltage, frequency, torque, current, power, speed.
Motor communication error: Unable to establish connection with motor controller. Check communication cables and controller status.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to read motor parameters. Verify user access rights.
usage: Specify the motor_id and optionally filter parameter_types to retrieve. Returns current motor operating parameters.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when parameters were read
